activityLogSiteDataDomainsText.description: Invoked cleanup of $siteData$ for: $domains$.  Found in Activity Log Detailed Entries.

addNewExpressionNotification.message: Aggiungere $expression$ al tipo di elenco $listType$ sotto il negozio dei cooki $cookieStore$.
addNewExpressionNotification.description: Adding $expression$ to list type $listType$ under cookie store $cookieStore$.  Used in notification when right-click action was performed.

addNewExpressionNotificationFailed.message: Impossibile recuperare il dominio da aggiungere dove è stato emesso il click destro.
addNewExpressionNotificationFailed.description: Could not fetch domain to add from where right-click was issued.

addNewExpressionNotificationIgnore.message: Se l'espressione esiste già, questa sarà ignorata.
addNewExpressionNotificationIgnore.description: If expression already exists, this will be ignored.  Used in notification when right-click action was performed.

browsingDataWarning.message: ATTENZIONE: Prima di abilitare ognuna delle seguenti opzioni di polizia dei dati del sito, TUTTI i dati esistenti per quel tipo saranno eliminati.
browsingDataWarning.description: WARNING:  Upon enabling any of the following site data cleanup options, ALL existing data for that type will be cleared.  Found in CAD Settings

cacheCleanupText.description: Enable Cache Cleanup (Firefox 78+, Chrome 74+).  Found in CAD Settings.

chromeDebugMode.message: Assicurarsi che la 'Modalità sviluppatore' sia abilitata, quindi fare clic su 'pagina di sfondo' sotto Visualizzazione ispezione.
chromeDebugMode.description: Ensure 'Developer Mode' is enabled, then click on 'background page' under Inspect View.  This is shown if debug mode is enabled.

cleanDiscardedText.message: Abilita Pulizia per le Schede Scartate/Caricate
cleanDiscardedText.description: Enable Cleanup for Discarded/Unloaded Tabs.  Found in Settings.

cleanExpiredCookiesText.description: Clean All Expired Cookies.  Found in Settings.

cleanIgnoringOpenTabsText.description: Clean, include open tabs.  Found in the additional cleanup options in the popup.

cleanupDomainChangeText.message: Attiva la pulizia al cambiamento di dominio

cleanupActionsBypass.message: Attenzione - le azioni qui sotto ignorano le impostazioni!
cleanupActionsBypass.description: Warning - Actions below ignore settings!    Found in the additional cleanup options in the popup.

consoleDebugMode.description: Click on the Console Tab.  Found after enabling debug mode.

containerSiteDataWarning.message: ATTENZIONE: Abilitare le Schede Contenitori con qualsiasi pulizia dei dati di navigazione aggiuntiva sopra potrebbe causare effetti collaterali indesiderati per le limitazioni delle API del browser. I tipi di dati del sito, con l'eccezione dei cookie, saranno eliminati dal nome del host per TUTTI i contenitori.
containerSiteDataWarning.description: WARNING:  Enabling Container Tabs with any of the additional browsing data cleanups above may cause unwanted side effects due to browser API limitations.  Site data types, with the exception of cookies, will be cleared by hostname for ALL containers.  Found in CAD Settings.

contextMenusParentClean.description: Manual Cleaning Menu.  Shown on right-clicks of Page/Browser Action.

contextMenusParentExpression.description: Add Domain/Expression Menu.  Shown on right-clicks of Page/Link/Selection.

contextMenusSelectedDomainLink.message: Solo per il dominio del link selezionato
contextMenusSelectedDomainLink.description: For domain only of selected link.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedDomainPage.message: Solo per il dominio della pagina selezionata
contextMenusSelectedDomainPage.description: For domain only of selected page.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedDomainText.message: Solo per il dominio del testo selezionato: $selected$
contextMenusSelectedDomainText.description: For domain only of selected text: $selected$.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainLink.message: Per tutti i sottodomini con dominio del collegamento selezionato
contextMenusSelectedSubdomainLink.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected link.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainPage.message: Per tutti i sottodomini con dominio della pagina selezionata
contextMenusSelectedSubdomainPage.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected page.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextMenusSelectedSubdomainText.message: Per tutti i sottodomini con dominio del testo selezionato: $selected$
contextMenusSelectedSubdomainText.description: For all subdomains with domain of selected text.  Shown in right-click menu.

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.message: Attiva il supporto per le schede contenitore di Firefox
contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs.  Only in Firefox.

cookiesText.description: Cookies.  Primarily used in popup via alternate clean action dropdown.

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Pulisci i cookie delle schede aperte all'avvio
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Esegui la pulizia ora, include i domini dalle schede aperte
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs.  This is shown on mouseover from the available dropdown buttons.

cookieCleanupText.message: Esegui la pulizia ora, esclude i domini dalle schede aperte
cookieCleanupText.description: Run cleanup now, exclude domains from open tabs. This is shown on mouseover on the button.

createDefaultExpressionOptionsText.description: Create Default Expression Options.  Used in 'List of Expressions'

currentContainerInfo.description: Current Container Selected:  $ID$ ( $Name ).  Found in List of Expressions only if Firefox containers enabled.

Name.example: Personal (whatever the user has named the container) - or - translated version of 'Invalid Container'

debugMode.message: Abilita modalità debug (output di console aggiuntivi)

defaultText.description: Default.  Used in List of Expression in Firefox for Default / No Container.

defaultContainerText.description: No Container.  This will be in brackets.  Used in List of Expression in Firefox for Default / No Container

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Cambia per disattivare la pulizia automatica (modalità manuale)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

dropdownAdditionalCleaningOptions.message: Attiva/disattiva tendina di azioni di pulizia aggiuntive
dropdownAdditionalCleaningOptions.description: (Screen-readers only) - Toggle Additional Cleaning Actions Dropdown

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Cambia per attivare la pulizia automatica (modalità automatica)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

enableCleanupLogText.message: Attiva il registro delle puliture e il contatore

enableContextMenus.message: Abilita Menu del Contesto (Menu Click Destro)
enableContextMenus.description: Enable Context Menus (Right-Click Menu).  Shown in CAD Settings

enableGreyListCleanup.message: Abilita la pulizia della lista grigia al riavvio del browser
enableGreyListCleanup.description: Enable Greylist Cleanup on Browser Restart

enableNewVersionPopup.message: Attiva il popup quando viene pubblicata una nuova versione
enableNewVersionPopup.description: Enable Popup when New Version is Released

exportTitleTimestamp.message: Verrà aggiunto un timestamp al nome del file durante l'esportazione.
exportTitleTimestamp.description: A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.

extensionDescription.message: Prendi il controllo dei tuoi cookie! Elimina automaticamente i cookie inutilizzati dalle schede chiuse e mantieni solo quelli che vuoi.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Automatically delete unwanted cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

faqText.message: Domande frequenti, problemi comuni e soluzioni
faqText.description: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions

filterDebugMode.message: Per vedere solo gli output di debug di questa estensione, filtrare l'output in base alla seguente riga:
filterDebugMode.description: To see only debug outputs by this extension, filter output by the following line.  Found after enabling debug mode.

greyCleanLocalstorage.message: Deseleziona 'Mantieni Localstorage' nelle nuove espressioni in lista grigia
greyCleanLocalstorage.description: Uncheck 'Keep LocalStorage' on New Greylist Expressions

groupExpressionDefaultNotice.message: Stai cercando di impostare le opzioni predefinite dell'espressione per le nuove espressioni? È stata migliorata per essere essa stessa un'opzione dell'espressione! Visita $listExpression$ per iniziare!
groupExpressionDefaultNotice.description: Looking to set default expression options for new expressions?  It has been enhanced to be an expression option itself!  Visit $listExpression$ to get started!  Shown in Settings

listExpression.example: List of Expressions <- the translated version

importFileTypeInvalid.description: File given is not a type we handle

importFileValidationFailed.message: Il file fornito ha fallito la verifica

keepCacheText.description: Keep Cache. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepDefaultIcon.message: Mantieni icone predefinite su tutti i tipi di lista
keepDefaultIcon.description: Keep Default Icons on all list types.  Disabled: keep blue icon, grey for automatic cleaning disabled.  Enabled: red/yellow/blue depending on matching expressions in list.

keepIndexedDBText.description: Keep IndexedDB. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepIndexedDBGreyText.description: Keep IndexedDB until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepLocalstorageText.description: Keep LocalStorage. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepPluginDataText.description: Keep Plugin Data. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepPluginDataGreyText.description: Keep Plugin Data until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

keepServiceWorkersText.description: Keep Service Workers. Found in Expression Options. For Whitelist entries.

keepServiceWorkersGreyText.description: Keep Service Workers until restart. Found in Expression Options. For Greylist entries.

localStorageCleanupText.description: Enable LocalStorage Cleanup (Firefox 58+, Chrome 74+).  Found in CAD Settings.

manualCleanSiteDataIndexedDB.description: Clean IndexedDB for this domain.  Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

manualCleanSiteDataLocalStorage.description: Clean LocalStorage for this domain.  Found in Popup clean dropdown menu.

noPrivateLogging.description: Cleanup Logs will not be generated for tabs in Private Browsing / Incognito / InPrivate.

noRulesText.message: Nessuna regola corrispondente a questo dominio.

notificationContent.description: Some site data, including 123 Cookie(s), removed from: google.com, facebook.com

notificationTitleSiteData.message: Rimozione dei Dati del Sito Innescata!
notificationTitleSiteData.description: Site Data Removal Triggered!  Used in Notification Title.

notifyCookieCleanUpText.message: Mostra una notifica dopo la pulizia automatica
notifyCookieCleanUpText.description: Show Notification After Automatic Cleanup.  Found in settings.

oldReleasesText.description: Older release notes can be viewed online at

pluginDataCleanupText.description: Enable Plugin Data Cleanup (Firefox 78+, Chrome 74+).  Found in CAD Settings.

pluginDataText.description: Plugin Data.  Primarily used in notifications.

reasonCleanCookieExpired.message: Pulizia parziale a causa dei cookie scaduti da $hostname$.
reasonCleanCookieExpired.description: Partial clean because of expired cookies from $hostname$.

reasonCleanCookieName.message: Pulizia parziale a causa di $matchedExpression$ trovato in $listType$
reasonCleanCookieName.description: Partial clean because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$.  Used in cleanup logs.

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Pulisci a causa dell'avvio pulitura e $matchedExpression$ è in lista grigia
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and $matchedExpression$ is in the Greylist. Used in cleanup log.

reasonCleanNoList.message: Pulisci perché $hostname$ non è in lista bianca/grigia
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Pulisci a causa dell'avvio pulitura e $hostname$ non è in lista bianca/grigia
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and $hostname$ is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched $matchedExpression$ in the $listType$

reasonKeepOpenTab.message: Mantieni a causa delle schede aperte di *.$mainDomain$
reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.$mainDomain$

reasonTabsWereIgnored.message: e inoltre le schede aperte sono state ignorate
reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: [Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists] and also open tabs were ignored

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: [Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists] or in any open tabs

removeActivityLogEntryText.description: Remove Log Entry.  Shown in summary activity log for individual log removal.

removeAllExpressionsConfirm.message:
Sei sicuro di voler rimuovere TUTTE le ($expressionCount$) espressioni salvate da ($listCount$) elenchi?

L'AZIONE NON PUÒ ESSERE ANNULLATA!

Digita [ $expressionCount$ ] e clicca OK per eliminare.
removeAllExpressionsConfirm.description:
Are you sure you want to remove ALL ($expressionCount$) saved expression(s) from ($listCount$) list(s)?

THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!

Type [ $expressionCount$ ] and click OK to delete.  Popup prompt if Delete All Expression is clicked.

removeListText.message: Rimuovi tutte le espressioni dalla lista selezionata
removeListText.description: Remove All Expressions from Selected List.  Shown in List of Expressions, only on Firefox and if containers/contextual identities is enabled.

removeStorageCount.description: Removed $count$ item(s) from $storageType$. Used in manual localstorage clean notification.

resetCookieCounterText.description: Reset Cookie Counters.  Button in Welcome Page.

reviewLinkMessage.message: Grazie per avere provato $cadTitle$. Se ti è piaciuto, scrivi una recensione.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

sessionStorageText.description: SessionStorage.  Used in manual localstorage clean notification

settingGroupOtherBrowsing.message: Altre opzioni di pulizia dati di navigazione

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain over the Icon

siteDataText.description: Site Data.  Found in Activity Log Summary and Notifications.

sizePopupText.description: Size of Popup (in px).  This sets the font size in the Popup.

sizeSettingText.description: Size of Setting Pages (in px).  This sets the font size in the Setting Pages.

toGreyListText.message: Aggiungi alla lista grigia (pulisci al riavvio del browser)

toWhiteListText.message: Aggiungi alla lista bianca (non pulire mai)

toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications

versionNumberText.description: $CAD$ version 3.2.1.  The actual number is formatted differently and will be right below this text.

welcomeMessage.message: Ehilà! Durante questa sessione, $cadTitle$ ha eliminato $sessionDeleted$ cookie e in totale $totalDeleted$ cookie.
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.
